alert.note: Alert for Lee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL DOUGHERTY... WESTERN LEE AND SOUTHEASTERN TERRELL COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dawson, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Albany, Sasser, Forrester, Bridges Crossroad, Palmyra, Century, Jordan Place, Starksville, Byne Crossroads, Armena, Neyami, Chickasawhatchee, Mossy Dell, and Stocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
